mapper.insert: insert into board_table(memberId, boardTitle, boardContents, boardWriter, fileAttached) values (#{memberId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{boardWriter} ,#{fileAttached})
insert into board_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select * from board_table order by boardHits desc
select * from board_table order by id desc Limit #{start}, #{Limit}
mapper.update: update board_table set boardHits=boardHits+1 where id=#{id}
update board_table set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from board_table where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%') order by id desc, boardHits desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(id) from board_table where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
